p: We conducted ten semi-structured interviews after the survey was administered to further investigate collaboration, progress within the phases of climate change adaptation, and highly ranked barriers and opportunities (Appendix 2). From a pool of survey respondents who indicated a willingness to participate in interviews, we selected participants to achieve a balance among regions, employment groups, and gender. Interviews were conducted by phone, ranged in length from 60 to 90â€‰min, and were voice recorded with consent.
